firstPage.SecondContent: Works being carried out in digitalization

FourthPage.ThemeSubtitle: in the field of freight services

FifthPage.Option1: The customer first contacts the station
FifthPage.Option2: They go to the regional railway hub to sign a contract
FifthPage.Option3: They go to the regional customer center for mutual agreement
FifthPage.Option4: They come to the railway administration to confirm the loading application
FifthPage.Option5: They go to the bank to make a payment for railway services
FifthPage.Option6: They go to the regional customer center to get a certificate of payment confirmation
FifthPage.Option7: They take the information from the regional customer center and go to the station
FifthPage.CardOption1: The low speed of delivering goods to the destination
FifthPage.CardOption2: The presence of excessive bureaucratic processes in documentation
FifthPage.CardOption3: The customer's time spent using railway services amounts to 72 hours
FifthPage.CardOption4: The inability to calculate freight rates

SixthPage.stage_1: The customer registers on the website 'https://enakl.railway.uz
SixthPage.stage_2: Online payment is made based on the contract
SixthPage.Option1_text: Obtaining reliable information during the customer registration process
SixthPage.Option2_text: Obtaining information about payments from customers
SixthPage.Option3_text: Signing electronic documents using the E-IMZO system
SixthPage.Option4_text: One-ID allows the identification of users on websites
SixthPage.Option5_text: Integration work is being carried out through the Customs Committee information system
SixthPage.Option6_text: Calculating rates using the 'Rail-Tarif' server application
SixthPage.SecondCardOption_2: The time spent by the customer using railway services is reduced by 60 hours
SixthPage.SecondCardOption_3: Bureaucratic obstacles and factors causing corruption have been eliminated
SixthPage.SecondCardOption_4: The need to contact various railway offices has been eliminated
SixthPage.SecondCardOption_5: The quality of provided railway services has improved
SixthPage.SecondCardOption_6: Annual savings of 13 billion sum
SixthPage.ThirdCardOption_8: ALMALYK MINING AND METALLURGICAL COMBINAT JSC
